00019 #include "device.h"
00020 #include "integrator.h"
00021 #include "scene.h"
00022 #include "sobol.h"
00023 
00024 #include "util_hash.h"

00026 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00027 
00028 Integrator::Integrator()
00029 {
00030     min_bounce = 2;
00031     max_bounce = 7;
00032 
00033     max_diffuse_bounce = max_bounce;
00034     max_glossy_bounce = max_bounce;
00035     max_transmission_bounce = max_bounce;
00036     probalistic_termination = true;
00037 
00038     transparent_min_bounce = min_bounce;
00039     transparent_max_bounce = max_bounce;
00040     transparent_probalistic = true;
00041     transparent_shadows = false;
00042 
00043     no_caustics = false;
00044     seed = 0;
00045     layer_flag = ~0;
00046     sample_clamp = 0.0f;
00047 
00048     need_update = true;
00049 }
00050 
00051 Integrator::~Integrator()
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 void Integrator::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00056 {
00057     if(!need_update)
00058         return;
00059 
00060     device_free(device, dscene);
00061 
00062     KernelIntegrator *kintegrator = &dscene->data.integrator;
00063 
00064     /* integrator parameters */
00065     kintegrator->max_bounce = max_bounce + 1;
00066     if(probalistic_termination)
00067         kintegrator->min_bounce = min_bounce + 1;
00068     else
00069         kintegrator->min_bounce = kintegrator->max_bounce;
00070 
00071     kintegrator->max_diffuse_bounce = max_diffuse_bounce + 1;
00072     kintegrator->max_glossy_bounce = max_glossy_bounce + 1;
00073     kintegrator->max_transmission_bounce = max_transmission_bounce + 1;
00074 
00075     kintegrator->transparent_max_bounce = transparent_max_bounce + 1;
00076     if(transparent_probalistic)
00077         kintegrator->transparent_min_bounce = transparent_min_bounce + 1;
00078     else
00079         kintegrator->transparent_min_bounce = kintegrator->transparent_max_bounce;
00080 
00081     kintegrator->transparent_shadows = transparent_shadows;
00082 
00083     kintegrator->no_caustics = no_caustics;
00084     kintegrator->seed = hash_int(seed);
00085     kintegrator->layer_flag = layer_flag << PATH_RAY_LAYER_SHIFT;
00086 
00087     kintegrator->use_ambient_occlusion =
00088         ((dscene->data.film.pass_flag & PASS_AO) || dscene->data.background.ao_factor != 0.0f);
00089     
00090     kintegrator->sample_clamp = (sample_clamp == 0.0f)? FLT_MAX: sample_clamp*3.0f;
00091 
00092     /* sobol directions table */
00093     int dimensions = PRNG_BASE_NUM + (max_bounce + transparent_max_bounce + 2)*PRNG_BOUNCE_NUM;
00094     uint *directions = dscene->sobol_directions.resize(SOBOL_BITS*dimensions);
00095 
00096     sobol_generate_direction_vectors((uint(*)[SOBOL_BITS])directions, dimensions);
00097 
00098     device->tex_alloc("__sobol_directions", dscene->sobol_directions);
00099 
00100     need_update = false;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void Integrator::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00104 {
00105     device->tex_free(dscene->sobol_directions);
00106     dscene->sobol_directions.clear();
00107 }
00108 
00109 bool Integrator::modified(const Integrator& integrator)
00110 {
00111     return !(min_bounce == integrator.min_bounce &&
00112         max_bounce == integrator.max_bounce &&
00113         max_diffuse_bounce == integrator.max_diffuse_bounce &&
00114         max_glossy_bounce == integrator.max_glossy_bounce &&
00115         max_transmission_bounce == integrator.max_transmission_bounce &&
00116         probalistic_termination == integrator.probalistic_termination &&
00117         transparent_min_bounce == integrator.transparent_min_bounce &&
00118         transparent_max_bounce == integrator.transparent_max_bounce &&
00119         transparent_probalistic == integrator.transparent_probalistic &&
00120         transparent_shadows == integrator.transparent_shadows &&
00121         no_caustics == integrator.no_caustics &&
00122         layer_flag == integrator.layer_flag &&
00123         seed == integrator.seed &&
00124         sample_clamp == integrator.sample_clamp);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Integrator::tag_update(Scene *scene)
00128 {
00129     need_update = true;
00130 }
